text: Richard Evan Zieff (born November 1, 1961 in Weston, Massachusetts) is an American actor and voice-over coach best known for being the voice of Spike in The Tom and Jerry Show and for being the voice of Mr. Nosy and Mr. Nervous on The Mr. Men Show (while being credited as "Danny Katiana"). Category:American voice actors Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: Rick Zieff
